trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonDismissPopupEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonDismissPopupEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonDismissPopupEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonDismissPopupMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonDismissPopupEventArgs"></xref>類別具有指定<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonDismissPopupMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies when the popup is dismissed.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定當關閉快顯視窗。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates when the popup is dismissed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出快顯視窗關閉時。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies when the popup is dismissed.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定當關閉快顯視窗。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the specified event handler on the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 叫用指定的物件上指定的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonDismissPopupEventHandler> instance and invokes it.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會轉換為一般處理常式的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonDismissPopupEventHandler>執行個體，並叫用它。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonDismissPopupEventHandler>
要叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The target on which the handler is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 此處理常式會叫用的目標。
